name: iliofemoral

relating to the ilium (= the widest of the three bones that form the pelvis) and femur (= the long bone in the upper part of the leg): the iliofemoral ligament

relating to the iliac vein (= a vein in the pelvis) and femoral vein (= a vein at the top of the leg): the iliofemoral artery
